name: shane pulliam
text: Went here the night before Thanksgiving. There was no waiting, seated immediately, and had the whole place to ourselves. What a great change of pace from all the crowds. Their pan pizza is always good and elicits memories of going to a pizza hut growing up. Here's to making new memories with my family. Thanks Pizza Hut

name: Aaron Robertson
text: I love how consistent pizza hut is. I could be anywhere in the nation and I'd know what to expect from the hut. The pizza is high quality and the price is right. I've been eating here since I could chew my food and I won't stop until I'm in the ground.
